text:
Prince David Chavchavadze (20 May 1924 – 5 October 2014) was an British-born American author and civil servant. He was a former Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) officer for the United States. He is of a Georgian-Russian origin. He was born in London, England.
Chavchavadze died in his sleep on 5 October 2014 in Washington, D.C., after a long illness, aged 90.
